org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.api

Interface IPMService


  • public interface IPMService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkFileInfoIsAccessible(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.Node node)
      Checks that the file backing the node is accessible on the file system.

      Compares the three provided under the existing tree root node with the tree under the comparison tree root node.
      org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.Node createTreeFromFileSystem(Path path)
      Create a tree from the file system.
      void ignoreNode(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.Node node, boolean status)
      Change the ignored status of a node.

      Merges the provided comparison tree into the existing tree.

      Refreshes the tree content with the latest state from the file system.
      void remapNode(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.Node node, Path newPath)
      Remaps a node to the new path, will attempt to remap children under the provided path is possible, will leave them unchanged if there is no match under the new path.

    • Method Detail

      • createTreeFromFileSystem

        org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.Node createTreeFromFileSystem(Path path)
                                                                    throws IOException
        Create a tree from the file system. The tree has file data associated with it, but does not have types assigned to nodes.
        Parameters:
        path - The path on the file system to create a node tree from.
        Returns:
        root of tree
        Throws:
        IOException - If a file can't be read or a symbolic link cycle is found.

      • ignoreNode

        void ignoreNode(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.Node node,
                boolean status)
        Change the ignored status of a node. This may cause the types of other nodes to change. If a node is marked as ignored, all descendants are also marked as ignored. If a node is marked as not ignored, all descendants and ancestors are also marked as not ignored.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to change the ignored status for.
        status - The new status of the node.

      • compareTree

        Map<org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.Node,NodeComparison> compareTree(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.Node existingTree,
                                                                                  org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.Node comparisonTree)
        Compares the three provided under the existing tree root node with the tree under the comparison tree root node.
        Parameters:
        existingTree - The root node of the existing tree to compare.
        comparisonTree - The root node of the new tree to compare against the existing tree.
        Returns:
        A map of nodes and their status after comparison.

      • mergeTree

        boolean mergeTree(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.Node existingTree,
                  Map<org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.Node,NodeComparison> comparisonResult)
        Merges the provided comparison tree into the existing tree.
        Parameters:
        existingTree - The existing tree that will receive the results of the merge.
        comparisonResult - A map of the comparison result to apply to the existing tree.
        Returns:
        True if the tree was successfully merged, false otherwise

      • checkFileInfoIsAccessible

        boolean checkFileInfoIsAccessible(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.Node node)
        Checks that the file backing the node is accessible on the file system. Note that this method makes no assertion that the file or folder pointed to was the original one, just that something exists at the file location stored in the nodes file info.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to check if it's file info file location is still accessible.
        Returns:
        true if the file is accessible false otherwise.

      • remapNode

        void remapNode(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.Node node,
               Path newPath)
        throws IOException
        Remaps a node to the new path, will attempt to remap children under the provided path is possible, will leave them unchanged if there is no match under the new path.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to remap.
        newPath - The new path to assign to the node.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • refreshTreeContent

        Map<org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.Node,NodeComparison> refreshTreeContent(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.Node node)
                                                                                  throws IOException
        Refreshes the tree content with the latest state from the file system. This will build a tree from the current file system backing the given node to compare with the existing tree structure.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to refresh.
        Returns:
        A map of the nodes and their status after comparison.
        Throws:
        IOException - if we cannot build teh comparison tree
